name: Infernoble Knight Astolfo
text: You can banish 1 FIRE Warrior monster from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can make this card's Level become the banished monster's Level. You can banish this card from your GY; during your 2nd Standby Phase after activating this effect, Special Summon this banished card, then you can Special Summon 1 of your FIRE Warrior monsters that is banished or in your GY. You can only use each effect of "Infernoble Knight Astolfo" once per Duel.
